origin.divine_origins.devil.name: Devil
origin.divine_origins.devil.description: A fiery being from the depths of the Nether, born to fight

origin.divine_origins.jotunn.name: Jotunn

origin.divine_origins.griffin.descriptio: A mythological half eagle, half lion
origin.divine_origins.griffin.name: Griffin
origin.divine_origins.minotaur.descripti: An extremely strong giant from Greek mythology
Your skin has a fiery tint.
power.divine_origins.aquatic_alien.name: Wet wings
power.divine_origins.aquatic_alien.descr: When in water, your wings become wet and slow you down, causing you to take more damage.
power.divine_origins.bird_of_prey.name: Bird of Prey
power.divine_origins.bird_of_prey.descri: You are a natural hunter. If someone attacks you with a ranged weapon, you mark them.
power.divine_origins.enhanced_jump.name: Wing-assisted Jump
power.divine_origins.enhanced_jump.descr: You can jump higher due to your wings.
power.divine_origins.lions_sprint.name: Lion's sprint
power.divine_origins.lions_sprint.descri: When you attack someone, you gain a short speed boost
power.divine_origins.burn_in_daylight.de: Daylight slowly kills you, even though you are immune to fire.
power.divine_origins.soul_steal.name: Soul Steal
power.divine_origins.soul_steal.descript: When you kill a player, you gain regeneration.
power.divine_origins.expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
power.divine_origins.divine_regen.name: Divine Regen
power.divine_origins.ichor.name: Ichor Blood
power.divine_origins.ichor.description: You are immune to wither, poison, slowness, and blindness.
power.divine_origins.weak.name: Weak
power.divine_origins.undead_vulnerabilit: Undead mobs deal significantly more damage to you.
power.divine_origins.frost_touch.name: Frost Touch
power.divine_origins.slow.name: Slow
power.divine_origins.natural_armor.name: Natural Armor
power.divine_origins.natural_armor.descr: You have extremely strong armor naturally.
